section.p: You emerge from the maze into a passage that leads to a small funnel-shaped chamber. Peering out from behind a cleft in the rock, you see five grotesque warriors guarding a book that rests between them on a jewelled lectern. They are staring fiercely in all directions, alert and ready to deal with any interloper.
You know without being told that your task is to steal the book from their midst.
Make a THIEVERY roll at a Difficulty of 14 .
